name: Alistar
title: the Minotaur
lore: Always a mighty warrior with a fearsome reputation, Alistar seeks revenge for the death of his clan at the hands of the Noxian empire. Though he was enslaved and forced into the life of a gladiator, his unbreakable will was what kept him from truly becoming a beast. Now, free of the chains of his former masters, he fights in the name of the downtrodden and the disadvantaged, his rage as much a weapon as his horns, hooves and fists.
blurb: Always a mighty warrior with a fearsome reputation, Alistar seeks revenge for the death of his clan at the hands of the Noxian empire. Though he was enslaved and forced into the life of a gladiator, his unbreakable will was what kept him from truly...
allytips: Using Pulverize can allow you to establish better positioning for Headbutt.
Movement speed is very important on Alistar. Consider which boots to buy carefully.
Using Flash can allow you catch your target off guard to knock them back into your allies with Pulverize and Headbutt.
enemytips: Alistar is very disruptive but very tough - try to target more fragile damage dealers.
Watch out for the Pulverize-Headbutt combo when around turrets.
When Alistar uses his ultimate, it's often better to move back and wait until the effect wears off before attacking him.

riot_spells.name: Pulverize
riot_spells.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
riot_spells.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and tossing nearby enemy units into the air for {{ e3 }} second.

riot_spells.name: Headbutt
riot_spells.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
riot_spells.tooltip: Alistar rams into an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and knocking them back.

riot_spells.name: Trample
riot_spells.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

riot_spells.name: Unbreakable Will
riot_spells.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
riot_spells.tooltip: Removes all disables from Alistar. For {{ rduration }} seconds Alistar takes {{ rdamagereduction }}% reduced physical and magical damage.

riot_passive.name: Triumphant Roar
riot_passive.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.

i1.name: Triumphant Roar
i1.blurb: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Alistar''' gains a stack of ''Triumph'' every time he {{tip|stun|stuns}} or {{tip|airborne|displaces}} at least one enemy champion, and every time a minion, a small monster or a [[pet]] dies.
i1.description2: At 7 ''Triumph'' stacks, '''Alistar''' roars, {{tip|healing}} himself for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|20 to 139}} health}}}} and all nearby allied champions for{{ft|double the amount|{{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|20*2 to 139*2}} health}}}}}}.
i1.description3: '''Alistar''' roars instantly if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies. Once ''Triumph'' stacks are consumed '''Alistar''' cannot gain more again for a short duration.
i1.notes: * Healing is affected by {{ii|Spirit Visage}}, {{ri|Revitalize}} and {{sti|Heal Power}}.

q1.name: Pulverize
q1.blurb: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' slams the ground beneath him, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 1 second.
q1.notes: * ''Pulverize'' can be activated during {{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}} to immediately cast on arrival.

w1.name: Headbutt
w1.blurb: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy location. If the target is still in range on arrival, he deals them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second while also {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 650 units.
w1.notes:
* ''Headbutt'' will knock enemies through most walls.
** {{ai|Pulverize|Alistar}} will interrupt the knockback.

e1.name: Trample
e1.blurb: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' tramples the ground around him every {{fd|0.5}} seconds for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and gaining a ''Trample'' stack every time the ability damages at least one enemy champion. '''Alistar''' is {{tip|ghosted}} for the duration.
e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|8 to 20}} {{as|(+ 4% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 200}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
e1.description2: At 5 ''Trample'' stacks, '''Alistar's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{as|{{pp|35 to 290}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} his target for 1 second.
e1.notes:
* ''Trample's'' effects do not stack. Subsequent ''Trample'' casts will refresh its duration.
* ''[[Spell shield]]'' will block the empowered attack but not the [[Damage over time|damage-over-time]].

r1.name: Unbreakable Will
r1.blurb: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}}. For the next 7 seconds,  '''Alistar''' reduces all incoming physical and magic damage.
r1.notes:
* ''Unbreakable Will'' does not remove or prevent any new crowd control from being applied on him after the activation.
* The damage reduction occurs '''''after''''' armor and magic resistance.
* True damage will not be reduced by any form of damage reduction.
